Class HomeView

java.lang.Object
View.HomeView
public class HomeView extends Object
View of the Main Home Page called post successful authentication

    HomeView constructor initializes the mainFrame display and configures size + parameters

    • addMessageToChat

      public void addMessageToChat(String message, SPEAKER speaker)
      adds a specific message to the main chat window using the SPEAKER type to determine the display location
      Parameters:
      message - - message to be added to the display
      speaker - - who the message is coming from - AI or USER
